Player History
Drafted in 45th round, 715th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Injured on 4/5/2015 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/8/2015 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/2016, off James Jolin (BOS)...
Injured on 8/25/2016 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Released by Kansas City on 10/23/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/11/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
